outline:
1. to fear, tremble, revere, dread, be in awe or dread
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be in dread
      2. to be in awe
    2. (Piel) to be in great dread
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to dread
kjv_def: be afraid, stand in awe, (be in) fear, make to shake.
strongs_def: to be startled (by a sudden alarm); hence, to fear in general
